price: 17. Loba: Nani akobatela bino soki Allah alingi mabe ezua bino too soki alingi ngolu naye ezua bino nani akopekisa yango? Mpe bakozua mokonzi mpe mosungi mosusu te na esika ya Allah.
arabic: قُلۡ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَعۡصِمُكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗۚ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul man dhā alladhī yaʿṣimukum mina al-lahi in arāda bikum sūan aw arāda bikum raḥmatan walā yajidūna lahum min dūni al-lahi waliyyan walā naṣīran
